title: The Wonder of It All
overview: The Wonder of it All focuses on the human side of the men behind the Apollo missions through candid interviews with seven of the Apollo astronauts: Buzz Aldrin, Alan Bean, Edgar Mitchell, John Young, Charles Duke, Eugene Cernan and Harrison Schmitt.  They all reflect on the training, the tragedies, the camaraderie, and the effect that their space travel has had on their families.
